group_1.narration: This is a story about the Halloween party@we had over in Futatsugi City!

group_1.textLeft: Happy Halloween, guys!

group_1.textRight: Well ain't your costume just adorable, Urara.@Where'd you get it?

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh, Sasha and the crew made it for me!

group_1.textRight: That's a clown, right? That's just like you,@with your street performances and all!
Ah, then like do a trick for us.

group_1.textLeft: Leave it to me!@I'm a street performance professional!
[chara:103650:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Ta-daaah! Just like that!

group_1.textRight: I knew you were the best~
Aight, as a gift... Here, some candy.

group_1.textLeft: I can have this!?

group_1.textRight: You can't just show us your pro moves@for nothing, now can you?

group_1.textLeft: Thanks a lot! [chara:103650:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103650:lipSynch_1][chara:103650:mouthOpen_1]Smile!

group_1.textRight: We may've jus' discovered a new Trick or@Treating method...!

group_1.textLeft: ...I getcha. I just came up with a sweet@idea, [chara:112102:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:112102:cheek_0][chara:112102:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:112102:lipSynch_1]neh heh.
Urara.

group_1.textCenter: Ah, Juri and Hikaru. What's up?

group_1.textRight: Urara, you wanna...eat more candy, don't ya?
And we got a great idea!

group_1.textCenter: It is a good idea, but won't she get mad?

group_1.textLeft: It'll be fiiine. Just believe in your pals.

group_1.textRight: In return, we'll split the candy three-ways.
You got a minute?
Urara's abouta do her street performance,@so I'd like you to watch 'er!

group_1.textLeft: Eh, she's gonna show me her tricks!?

group_1.textRight: Of course I will!
Here we go...like that!

group_1.textLeft: Woah, amazing! That's a...diabolo, right?
I knew you were crazy good at it!

group_1.textRight: Aight now, c'mere.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: It's Halloween, so you got candy, don'tcha?
That's the costa watchin' her street@performance, [chara:112102:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:112102:cheek_0][chara:112102:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:112102:lipSynch_1]neh heh.

group_1.textLeft: No waaay... Craaap...@This was just another shakedown...
Well, I got to see something cool, so I guess@I'm fine with it.
Here's some candy. Happy Halloween.

group_1.textRight: Thanks a lot! Happy Halloween to you!

group_1.textLeft: Now here's a moneymaker...@Alright, we're goin' outside!

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]W-what!? We're actually going outside...

group_1.textLeft: It's only a matter of time before Sis catches@onto us here, ain't it? [chara:112102:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:112102:cheek_0][chara:112102:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:112102:lipSynch_1]Neh heh.

group_1.narration: Then after that we went around outside@showing off my street performances.
We made a ton of people happy,@and we were happy getting candy,@so everyone was happy!
Or, at least we should've been,@but somehow our antics became@a rumor in Kamihama...

group_1.textCenter: Master, it's terrible...this...!@There's a post on social media...

group_1.narration: Beware of clowns in costume!@Rumor has it they'll show you a performance,@and then extort you for candy!

group_1.textRight: ...Don't tell me, Ayaka, you want to show us@a gag for some sweets...?

group_1.textLeft: Wha-huh? It ain't me! I mean it's a good idea,@but I wouldn't do it!

group_1.textRight: *Staaare...*

group_1.textLeft: Waaah! I'm being suspected!@I swear it's truuue!
I'm being wrong-fooly-accused!@From big top to big house!

group_1.narration: Rabi once told me this.@"No information spreads faster than gossip."
And sure enough as she said, the gossip bounced@straight from Kamihama right to Yuna...

group_1.textCenter: [chara:112100:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]You are forever banned from extorting@candy from people...!

group_1.textRight: B-but everyone was happy...

group_1.textLeft: What you're doing is hardly different from@banditry...

group_1.textRight: [chara:103650:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]B-banditry...!?

group_1.textLeft: Though Juri and Hikaru were the instigators,@you should still reflect on your actions...

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, ma'am... I really am sorry...@It won't happen again...

group_1.textLeft: As long as you understand, it's alright...
First of all...you should be proud of the skills@you possess...
Don't sell yourself short...
As for Juri and Hikaru, I'll be giving plenty@of punishment to you two later...
Tricking Urara into selling her performance art,@that in itself is a serious crime...

group_1.textRight: Ugh...

group_1.textLeft: Besides, do you really have to do such things...
After I prepared this mountain of candy@for everyone...?

group_1.textRight: For real?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's eat it together...
While Juri and Hikaru stay here and reflect@a little longer...

group_1.textRight: ...Tch, Sis has got a soft spot for Urara...

group_1.textLeft: Come, Urara. Let's enjoy ourselves...

group_1.textRight: Sure thing!
[chara:103650:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Heh heh heh, Halloween is happy after all!
